hey-first-line: I'm a Software Developer living in Santiago de Chile. I currently work as a Tech Manager at <glb /> where I lead and manage engineering teams, previously I worked for <wm /> in the streaming, media and entertainment industry.
hey-second-line: In my free time, I like to help others being a part of technology through mentorships or <link-talks-en /> to help new generations to learn together about technology.
